system.descriptor: Comprehension of an obscure language to communicate without arising suspicion. Resembling codes or ciphers, the unusual use of a common tongue, visual cues. Test not needed for normal conditions, only adverse or difficult ones.
system.uses:
Skill Test: Communicate or Comprehend the intended meaning of an interaction in a Secret Tongue despite bad conditions. Test difficulty varies with conditions.
Skill Groups: Adminstratum, Ecclesiarchy, Military, Navigator, Rogue Trader, Tech, Underdecks
